TableField.name: IndustryCodeID
TableField.phrase: Industry Code|The (primary) Industry Code that describes what an organization does

TableField.name: IndustrySectorID
TableField.phrase: Industry Sector|The highest level industry sector

TableField.name: IndustrySubSectorID
TableField.phrase: Industry Subsector|The sub-sector of the industry sector

TableField.name: IndustryGroupID
TableField.phrase: Industry Group|This is a sub-category below industry subsector.

TableField.name: Title
TableField.phrase: Code Title|The title that describes the industry code.

TableField.name: Description
TableField.phrase: Description|A longer description of the industry code.
TableField.sample: This industry comprises establishments primarily engaged in growing soybeans and/or producing soybean seeds.

ForeignField.name: IndustrySector
ForeignField.phrase: Industry Sector|The highest level industry sector

ForeignField.name: IndustrySubSector
ForeignField.phrase: Industry Subsector|The highest level industry sector

ForeignField.name: IndustryGroup
ForeignField.phrase: Industry Group|This is a sub-category below industry subsector.

CombinedField.name: RecordLabel
CombinedField.phrase: Record Label|The short, concise, label of the record for display purposes

CombinedField.name: IndustryCode
CombinedField.phrase: Code|A combined field used to describe this code when associating it with other records

ViewScreen.name: View
ViewScreen.phrase: View|View summary information about industry codes

EditScreen.name: Form
EditScreen.phrase: Form|Edit summary information about purchase catalogs

DocumentationSection.title: Introduction
DocumentationSection.p: The installation-specific introduction to the scope and purpose of this module should be entered here. You can click the online documentation link beneath the table of contents to see what the active agenda community has said to introduce this module. You are welcome to collect the thoughts of the community, copy them into your local documentation, and extend them to satisfy your local needs.
